title: One
subTitle: Click the button
spokenText: This is a post card from Fancis Alys exhibition at Tate Modern

title: Two
subTitle: On Click, Speak
spokenText: Thank you nathan for sending me this lovely card from Helsinki, hum hum kiss kiss

title: Three
subTitle: Stream a voice in the dark
spokenText: It is quiet perplexing to fanthom the intricate meaning of dust, snow and residue when they all scatter at my feet.. unexpectingly
